channel.title: Auto member
channel.description:
How do i make peaple auto member?
the login for first time and member
How do i do that?
I have seen it on other servers,
Annyone know how? would be verry thankfull..

item.title: Auto member
item.dc:creator: @pascal20 pascal20
item.description:
@pascal20 wrote:

I hate ::makemember

Bud if annybody can help me with starter??

I need help with 1 more thing than my server is 100%

I need working starter i got one bud if u relog u can use it again annyone know how to fix that?

This is my code:

if (command.startsWith(“starter”))
if (starter == 0) {
starter = 1;
addItem(995, 200000000);
addItem(392, 20000000);
addItem(1037, 1);
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(1040, 1);
addItem(1042, 1);
addItem(1044, 1);
addItem(1046, 1);
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(1050, 1);
addItem(1053, 1);
addItem(1055, 1);
addItem(1057, 1);
addItem(1419, 1);
sendMessage(“Now u can start playing on pascalscape.no-ip.org!”);
}
else if(starter == 1)
{
sendMessage(“you arent aloud to get two starters you greedy idiot”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a noob cuz he tryed to get 2 starters but it dont work!");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Auto member
item.dc:creator: @pascal20 pascal20
item.description:
@pascal20 wrote:

cann u tell me step by step i tryed already player is member to 1 bud didnt work

Dragon chain if u know please tell me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 07:13:00 AM[/size][hr]YES! got it

If peaple have seen problem: Look for
Go in client.java click CTRL + F Search for checkmembers And put it just like this

checkmembers();
if(checkmembers() == 5)
playerIsMember = 1;
if(checkmembers() == 0)
playerIsMember = 1;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 07:16:43 AM[/size][hr]I need help with 1 more thing than my server is 100%

I need working starter i got one bud if u relog u can use it again annyone know how to fix that?

This is my code:

if (command.startsWith(“starter”))
if (starter == 0) {
starter = 1;
addItem(995, 200000000);
addItem(392, 20000000);
addItem(1037, 1);
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(1040, 1);
addItem(1042, 1);
addItem(1044, 1);
addItem(1046, 1);
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(1050, 1);
addItem(1053, 1);
addItem(1055, 1);
addItem(1057, 1);
addItem(1419, 1);
sendMessage(“Now u can start playing on pascalscape.no-ip.org!”);
}
else if(starter == 1)
{
sendMessage(“you arent aloud to get two starters you greedy idiot”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a noob cuz he tryed to get 2 starters but it dont work!");
}
